Very hot, very humid and heavy monsoon rains; begins with the summer solstice.

Mild temperatures; 19 to 22 degrees Celsius; Autumnal equinox occurs in the middle of this season.
Very pleasant temperatures; generally, 20-25 degrees Celsius; ends with the winter solstice.

Moderately cold, but pleasant during occasional sunshine; temperatures may decrease below 10 degrees Celsius.This season is typical to tropical and subtropical regions, because trees actually shed their leaves in this season in tropical areas; starts with the winter solstice.
